item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

[quote=“hellwsfull, post:6, topic:312558”]i yaa why would u want that?? that makes no sence just put same portal on another spot;)
u guys forgot the most important 1 the 1 where when u click it there shows a box with more tele positions??[/quote]

You would want that because if you spawned another portal with the ID 7319, then it would teleport you to the same co-ords as the other portal spawned.

item.dc:creator: @JaydenD12 JaydenD12
item.description:
@JaydenD12 wrote:

[quote=“Jddogg9, post:4, topic:312558”]Aslo, what if the person is in pvp, and I don’t want them running in and clicking on the portal, would it be…

case 7319: 
            if(!inCombat) {
			sM("stop trying to teleport while in combat ;)");
			}else{
            teleportToX = 3117;
            teleportToY = 9842;
            sM("you have teleported to the donator area!");
}

and… if I have “character-donator = 2” as a donator… how would I put that in the code for only donators to go into the portal…?

case 7319: if(!inCombat) { sM("stop trying to teleport while in combat ;)"); if character-donator < 2; sM("you have to be a donator to use this portal! }else{ teleportToX = 3117; teleportToY = 9842; sM("you have teleported to the donator area!"); } [/quote]

Holy shit, learn code conventions.

if character-donator < 2;
sM("you have to be a donator to use this portal!			
}else{

item.dc:creator: @freakinlost freakinlost
item.description:
@freakinlost wrote:

add this portal to where you want it

        makeGlobalObject(2901, 3547, 7319, 0, 10); // memberportal

then add this

case 7319: // Portal At Front. teleportToX = 3117; teleportToY = 9842; sendMessage("you teleport to the train area"); break;

change the coord to where you want it to tele you
